input_args.text: "Report Copyright Violation If Soros Is Jewish Like They Say We Jews Should Have Him Excommunicated! He can be Catholic or anything else but not one of us. In our tribe these days, the way we excommunicate someone is to bar them from entering Israel. If Jon Voight says he's scum, that's good enough for me. Fuck him and kick him out.
